bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions, mostly affecting children, that emerge on the head, face and ears, with seeping liquid and itching that cannot be cured for an extended period of time. Pu ji fang 普濟方 272: 治甜瘡，以大棗去核，實以綠礬，火燒 微存性，研細貼之 , “To cure sweet sores , take a large jujube, remove the kernel and fill with lü fan . Roast slightly over a fire to maintain its nature. Then grind to a fine powder and apply this to the [sores]”.
